```{r setup }
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(flexdashboard)
library(plotly)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
```{r}
data("instacart") 
data("ny_noaa")

instacart = 
instacart %>% 
  group_by(product_name) %>% 
  summarize(orders = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(orders)) %>% 
  filter(orders>5000) %>% 
  mutate(product_name = fct_reorder(product_name, orders))


ny_noaa = 
  ny_noaa %>% 
  as_tibble(ny_noaa) %>% 
    janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(
   tmax = as.integer(tmax),
    tmin = as.integer(tmin),
    prcp = prcp/10,
    tmax = tmax/10,
    tmin = tmin/10,
  ) %>% mutate(
    text_label = str_c("ID: ", id)
  ) %>% 
  sample_n(1000)
  

```

### Chart A: Top 10 Most Ordered Products

```{r}

instacart %>% 
   plot_ly(
    x = ~ product_name, y = ~ orders,
    type = "bar",
    colors = "viridis"
  )


```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}

ny_noaa %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~ tmin, y = ~ tmax,
    type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
    alpha = .5,
    colors = "viridis",
    text = ~ text_label,
    color = ~id,
    showlegend = FALSE
  ) 


```
